com.ubudu.sdk

Class UbuduGeofenceManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ubudu.sdk.UbuduAreaManager
      • com.ubudu.sdk.UbuduGeofenceManager

  • public class UbuduGeofenceManager
extends UbuduAreaManager
    UbuduGeofenceManager let the application access to the geofencing features of the Ubudu SDK. It provides access to the specific sub-managers.
